content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?

content: I had this conversation with Yi-Nuo Wang from China.

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of the apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] Why did you decide to terminate the negotiation?
[Answer] I decided to terminate the negotiation because the potential tenant's offer was far too low for my liking. I am looking for a much higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes, what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] If yes, what was the final price?
[Answer] There was no agreement on a final price. The potential tenant proposed 400 Euros per month, but I was looking for a much higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner?
[Answer] I did not rate the likeability of the negotiation partner. My concern was solely on the rental price, and the negotiation did not proceed favorably.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended?
[Answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended during the negotiation. My focus was on the rental price, and I was not open to the proposed price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
[Answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended during the negotiation. The potential tenant's offer was not satisfactory, but there was no personal offense or discrimination involved.
